channel.title: Home on Molly's Cafe ☕
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Molly's Cafe ☕

item.title: The importance of game modding
item.description:
Game modding has been a part of video games for decades. From small changes to creating entirely new level designs, it’s been a way for players to take their favorite games into their own hands and change them however they’d like, whether that be for better or for worse. (Usually worse.)

Game modding also holds significant importance across the video gaming industry, and within the gaming community as a whole.

item.title: Meeting new people
item.description: Meeting new people is rough sometimes, especially for a chronically online introvert shut-in like myself. On the internet, there’s so many different people from differing cultures, backgrounds, everything, so sometimes it feels like you can never really know who you’re talking to unless you meet them face to face, and that alone is a huge coin flip. They could be exactly who you thought they were, and they act the same way they do in person as they did on the internet, or they can be a psychopathic freak who collects pill bug corpses and shit.

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Hello! You either found my site through one of my socials, or I shamelessly shilled it to you in excitement. Regardless, I’m thrilled you’re here!

This site took a while to get up and running. Mainly because of bouts of random demotivation, but also because setting up a website is much more work than I was expecting. In all honesty, I thought getting a cute domain would be the difficult part, turns out it was just 6 bucks. I’m honestly really impressed by people who manage to do this shit from scratch, it’s probably a nightmare.
